name: Jajil Yousuf
story: Ali Karizi grew up in the city of Tehran, where he developed a strong sense of community and loyalty to his people. After joining the military at a young age, he rose through the ranks quickly due to his natural leadership abilities and dedication to his country. Now, as a team leader in the dangerous conflict zone of Arma 3, Ali is determined to protect his fellow soldiers and complete the mission at all costs.
